00033 // UTF8 types: No UTF8, BOM prefix, or Raw UTF8
00034 enum EUtf8Str
00035 {
00036     utf8strNone,
00037     utf8strOptBOM,
00038     utf8strRaw
00039 };

00074 typedef const wxWX2MBbuf Unicode2CharBuf;
00075 typedef const wxMB2WXbuf Char2UnicodeBuf;
00076 
00077 Unicode2CharBuf unicode2char(const wxChar* x);
00078 inline Char2UnicodeBuf char2unicode(const char* x)  { return wxConvLocal.cMB2WX(x); }
00079 
00080 inline Unicode2CharBuf unicode2UTF8(const wxChar* x)    { return wxConvUTF8.cWX2MB(x); }
00081 inline Char2UnicodeBuf UTF82unicode(const char* x)  { return wxConvUTF8.cMB2WX(x); }
00082 
00083 inline const wxCharBuffer char2UTF8(const char *x)  { return unicode2UTF8(char2unicode(x)); }
00084 inline const wxCharBuffer UTF82char(const char *x)  { return unicode2char(UTF82unicode(x)); }
00085 
00086 inline Unicode2CharBuf filename2char(const wxChar* x)   { return wxConvFile.cWC2MB(x); }
00087 inline Char2UnicodeBuf char2filename(const char* x) { return wxConvFile.cMB2WC(x); }

00090 //
00091 // Replaces "&" with "&&" in 'in' for use with text-labels
00092 //
00093 inline wxString MakeStringEscaped(wxString in) {
00094     in.Replace(wxT("&"),wxT("&&"));
00095     return in;
00096 }
00097 
00098 // Make a string be a folder
00099 inline wxString MakeFoldername(wxString path) {
00100 
00101     if ( !path.IsEmpty() && ( path.Right(1) == wxT('/' )) ) {
00102         path.RemoveLast();
00103     }
00104 
00105     return path;
00106 }
00107 
00108 // Duplicates a string
00109 inline char* nstrdup(const char* src)
00110 {
00111     size_t len = (src ? strlen(src) : 0) + 1;
00112     char *res = new char[len];
00113     if ( src ) strcpy(res, src);
00114     res[len-1] = 0;
00115     return res;
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 // Replacements for atoi and atol that removes the need for converting
00120 // a string to normal chars with unicode2char. The value returned is the
00121 // value represented in the string or 0 if the conversion failed.
00122 inline long StrToLong(const wxString& str)
00123 {
00124     long value = 0;
00125     if (!str.ToLong(&value)) {  // value may be changed even if it failes according to wx docu
00126         value = 0;
00127     }
00128     return value;
00129 }
00130 
00131 inline unsigned long StrToULong(const wxString& str)
00132 {
00133     unsigned long value = 0;
00134     if (!str.ToULong(&value)) {
00135         value = 0;
00136     }
00137     return value;
00138 }
00139 
00140 inline unsigned long long StrToULongLong(const wxString& str)
00141 {
00142 #if wxCHECK_VERSION(2, 9, 0)
00143     unsigned long long value = 0;
00144     if (!str.ToULongLong(&value)) {
00145         value = 0;
00146     }
00147     return value;
00148 
00149 #else   // wx 2.8
00150 
00151     Unicode2CharBuf buf = unicode2char(str);
00152     if (!buf) {     // something went wrong
00153         return 0;
00154     }
00155 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00156     return _atoi64(buf);
00157 #else
00158     return atoll(buf);
00159 #endif
00160 #endif  // wx 2.8
00161 }
00162 
00163 inline size_t GetRawSize(const wxString& rstr, EUtf8Str eEncode)
00164 {
00165     size_t RealLen = 0;
00166     switch (eEncode) {
00167         case utf8strOptBOM:
00168             RealLen = 3;
00169         case utf8strRaw: {
00170             Unicode2CharBuf s(unicode2UTF8(rstr));
00171             if (s) {
00172                 RealLen += strlen(s);
00173                 break;
00174             } else {
00175                 RealLen = 0;
00176             }
00177         }
00178         default: {
00179             Unicode2CharBuf s(unicode2char(rstr));
00180             if (s) {
00181                 RealLen = strlen(s);
00182             }
00183         }
00184     }
00185 
00186     return RealLen;
00187 }
